name: Early Literacy and Parenting Classes
description: The center provides bilingual parenting, early literacy and parent-child interactive services including basic information and referral which aims to promote the understanding of early literacy development and the importance of implementation of these activities in the home.
fullDescription: The center provides bilingual parenting, early literacy and parent-child interactive services including basic information and referral which aims to promote the understanding of early literacy development and the importance of implementation of these activities in the home.
